law.catch_line: The Board shall use the Fund to make awards to:...

text.section:
The Board shall use the Fund to make awards to:
help acquire, build, rehabilitate, or preserve affordable housing;
help nonprofit organizations develop affordable housing; and
help promote affordable housing by contributing to pay the operating expenses of housing developments.
In any fiscal year, the Board may use up to 5% of the Fund to pay actual operating and staffing expenses directly related to the activities of the Trust.
